main.name: Pandhiti Sreenivasulu
main.description: I am a Sales & Recovery expert having 8 years of working on field. I did worked in famous companies like Bajaj, LIC and many more.
main.bio: Pandhiti Sreenivasulu Sales and Recovery expert from Nellore(Andhra Pradhesh) having 8 years of experience in working with Bajaj Finserv, SPI Cinemas pvt.ltd , ACT television pvt.ltd , IBL Consumer Finance and Moneyview. Now currently working as a Area Sales Officer (ASO) at Bharat Pe.
